name: Window Bomber
description:
Bomb your way up an infinite skyscraper while avoiding angry flower pots! Like in Tetris make lines to score. The biggest floor bombing combo you make, the highest your multiplier will go. Bomb your way to the top of the score board!

Controls
Up arrow: Move Up
Left arrow: Move Left
Right arrow: Move Right
Down arrow: Move Down
Z: Pose a bomb

A game by
Joel Launer - Art & Code 
Aurélien Da Campo - Code
Antoine Tuloup - Sound Design 
Sandro Dall'Aglio - Game Design

Pro Tip: A timely bomb can kill a flower pot!
